Uses of Class
org.lrdm.topologies.TopologyStrategy

Packages that use TopologyStrategy
Package
Description
org.lrdm
Package containing the domain classes of the simulator (e.g., Mirror and Link).
org.lrdm.effectors
Package containing the Effector to add Adaptation Action to the simulation.
org.lrdm.topologies
Package containing topology strategies of the simulator.

  • Uses of TopologyStrategy in org.lrdm.topologies

    Subclasses of TopologyStrategy in org.lrdm.topologies
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    BalancedTreeTopologyStrategy
    A TopologyStrategy which links the mirrors of the Network as a balanced tree with a single root Mirror.
    class 
    FullyConnectedTopology
    A TopologyStrategy which links each Mirror of the Network with each other mirror.
    class 
    NConnectedTopology
    A TopologyStrategy which connects each mirror with exactly n other mirrors.
